On Tue, 23 Oct 2001, <infosuresh@...> wrote:

>     After writing junit code i tried to implement the reporting
>     feature with Ant

You'd better ask question like this on ant-user@....

> java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
>  org/apache/xalanxslt/XSLTInputSource
> 
> I am getting this repeatedly even after mounting the respective jars
> and files.

Which jars do you have and which version of Ant do you use?  I vaguely
remember some problems with Ant 1.3 and Xalan1.  There have been
numerous reports, maybe you'll find a solution by searching the
archives at <http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=ant-user&r=1&w=2>

Stefan
